com.beerpong.game.view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.beerpong.game.view.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.input.GestureDetector.GestureListener, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameView
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
implements com.badlogic.gdx.input.GestureDetector.GestureListener
    The game view class. Everything that is related to the view is implemented here.
